mapper.select: SELECT id, account_name, account_password, staff_id, permissions, account_secret_email, create_time, create_emp, modify_time, modify_emp, account_state, account_remark FROM t_account where account_name = #{accountName}

SELECT t1.id, t1.account_name, t1.account_password, t1.staff_id, t1.permissions, t1.account_secret_email, t2.modify_time, t1.modify_emp, t1.account_state, t1.account_remark FROM t_account t1 left join t_history_password t2 on t1.id = t2.account_id where t1.account_name = #{accountName} ORDER BY t2.modify_time desc LIMIT 1
SELECT account_name,account_password FROM t_account where account_name = #{accountName}
SELECT id,account_id, history_password, create_time, create_emp, modify_time, modify_emp FROM t_history_password where account_id = #{id} order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_history_password(account_id,history_password, create_time, create_emp, modify_time, modify_emp) value(#{id}, #{accountPassword}, NOW(), #{id}, NOW(), #{id})
mapper.select: select t2.account_name, t2.account_secret_email, t1.modify_time from t_history_password t1 left join t_account t2 on t1.account_id = t2.id where 53 = DATEDIFF(NOW(),t1.modify_time) and t2.account_state != 3 GROUP BY t2.account_name ORDER BY t1.modify_time DESC
